‘The Sun and the Wind’ is a theatrical reminder of loved ones’ grief https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/the-sun-and-the-wind-is-a-theatrical-reminder-of-loved-ones-grief/FJRAOPTVGJEV7AJ7ALBDKYTHVI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/the-sun-and-the-wind-is-a-theatrical-reminder-of-loved-ones-grief/FJRAOPTVGJEV7AJ7ALBDKYTHVI/ Mary Afemata, Te Rito Journalism cadetJulie Edwards talks about themes of grief and trauma in a Māori theatre play.
